name: IteratorUtils_forEachTest
description: Unit tests for the IteratorUtils.forEach method.

test_cases.name: testForEachWithNonNullClosureAndNonNullIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the forEach method with a non-null closure and a non-null iterator.

test_cases.name: testForEachWithNonNullClosureAndNullIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the forEach method with a non-null closure and a null iterator.

test_cases.name: testForEachWithNullClosure
test_cases.description: Tests the forEach method with a null closure, expecting a NullPointerException.
